description:
Apocalypse is here!

All humans are dead or turned into zombies, you are the last survivor, you are #01!

Race from city to city and fight your way through hordes of zombies! Upgrade your car for more firepower! Discover many different levels, upgrade your base and move to new locations.
Build and upgrade your base, you can generate electricity and earn money for further upgrades.

Features:
- Great graphics!
- Many cars and outfits to unlock
- Many different levels
- Upgrade your car and base
- Leaderboard and Achievements
- Prestige-Mode
- Record and share your gameplay
